content: **ps ⭐️ i m a season 8 knit star ⭐️ shop this season s masterclasses $20 off during the early bird sales window april 21-30 here 1 ** a free version of this pattern can be found on my blog here 2 a sister pattern to the knit streamline tank this summer staple features wide straps and cascading faux knit ribbed detailing it pairs effortlessly with everything from high-waisted sailor
